ygData.subject: How to populate seed urls from database

 at the beginning of the crawl would connect to the database and fetch a li=
st of seed urls for the crawl, instead of using seeds.txt file ? What is ma=
x reasonable number of seeds Heritrix can handle ?

egrate such a module into Heritrix greatly appreciated !
